New Records: Naseem Shah hit two sixes off Fazalhaq Farooqi in the last over to secure Pakistan's victory
Key Match Events: Naseem Shah's late-order hitting was a turning point for Pakistan
Fazalhaq Farooqi's double-strike in the 18th over gave Afghanistan a chance
Haris Rauf and Asif Ali's physical altercation after the wicket
Pakistan's win secured their place in the final of the 2022 Asia Cup
Pre-Game Insights: Naseem Shah had a tight first over, restricting Afghanistan
Pakistan struggled initially, with Babar Azam getting out cheaply
Fakhar Zaman was run out by a direct hit from Najibullah Zadran
Post-Match Reflections: Pakistan players celebrated wildly, while Afghanistan players were inconsolable
The match marked the end of Afghanistan's campaign in the tournament
Miscellaneous Highlights: The result eliminated both Afghanistan and India from the tournament
